thread.title: Chief Technology Officer, Sean Cassidy, Represents Cybersecurity Firm Praesidio at FinDEVr Technology Conference
thread.title_full: Chief Technology Officer, Sean Cassidy, Represents Cybersecurity Firm Praesidio at FinDEVr Technology Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chief Technology Officer, Sean Cassidy, Represents Cybersecurity Firm Praesidio at FinDEVr Technology Conference
text:
Sean Cassidy speaks on doing the impossible with log analysis during his live onstage cybersecurity presentation
San Francisco, CA
When the 2015 FinDEVr conference for technical developers, focused on financial services, kicks off on October 6, Praesidio will be represented by its Chief Technology Officer, Sean Cassidy. He will present on the undervalued importance of log data and how Praesidio’s state-of-the-art technology corrects this dangerous mistake.
“Praesidio is the only Cybersecurity Management company focused exclusively on Financial Institutions. Cybersecurity Management is an emerging need that has stemmed from the vast proliferation of point solutions that IT Security teams must monitor. They face tough challenges, like: inability to monitor the entire network because of cost, no real-time analytics, and lack of qualified security candidates. FinDEVr is excited to have Sean Cassidy, Praesidio’s CTO, present at this year’s conference as the increasing scrutiny on BOD accountability for cybersecurity attacks is going to drive demand for real-time analytics that can prove how secure a Financial Institution really is,” said Eric Mattson, CEO of Finovate.
Cassidy's exceptional ability to make complex subjects understood by all levels of technical aptitude helps him explain the current landscape of security efforts and detail the necessity for proper defense through log analysis. With Cassidy's strategic vision, his engineering team has built a cybersecurity management solution for Financial Institutions that is unrivaled in the marketplace.
“Getting a chance to talk about something I am so passionate about, cybersecurity, is a huge honor. I will be talking about the valuable insights that can be gained from log analysis, including Praesidio’s advanced threat detection features,” said Cassidy. “FinDEVr is a trend-making financial tech conference that Praesidio is proud to be a part of.”
FinDEVr is a respected Financial Technical (Fin Tech) conference, being held in San Francisco this year and will showcase new technologies for builders. Software companies and financial institutions from around the nation will attend this two-day event. Finovate, the conference founder, has been hosting finance and technical conventions since 2007.
About Praesidio: Praesidio is a cloud-based cybersecurity company that was formed by bankers and security experts to solve the critical, real-world problems of breach detection, remediation, and governance insight that Financial Institutions (FI) are grappling with today. Praesidio bridges the gap between Governance and IT by linking your cybersecurity policies with the millions of system events where threats hide. It aggregates data across all cybersecurity tools to provide real-time management reporting that proves to your security team, board, auditors and regulators that your FI is actively managing and enforcing its policies. Praesidio’s integrated policies and best practices help FIs know definitively that they are safe.
About FinDEVr: FinDEVr ( http://www.findevr.com , @FinDEVr) is the only conference focused exclusively on the builders of financial and banking technology. It showcases the latest tools, technologies, APIs, platforms, case studies and tutorials that developers, software architects, designers, IT executives, and other builders will use to create the next wave of fintech innovation. For more information on the event or to view videos of previous presentations, please visit sanfran2015.findevr.com.
